description.english: You found the Dossiers of each of ARK's initial Specimens!
description.italian: Hai trovato i fascicoli di tutte le specie iniziali di ARK!
description.spanish: ¡Has encontrado los Dosieres de cada espécimen inicial de Ark!
description.turkish: ARK'ın ilk numunelerinin her bir dosyasını buldun!
description.german: Du hast die Dossiers von allen ARK Spezies gefunden!
description.french: Vous avez trouvé les Dossiers de chacun des échantillons initiaux de ARK !
description.russian: Вы собрали досье всех первоначальных существ!
description.ukrainian: Ви зібрали досьє на всіх істот!
description.czech: Našel jsi Spisy každého exempláře ARKu!
description.hungarian: Megtaláltad az ARK minden példányának a dossziéját!
description.koreana: ARK의 초기 표본 각각에 대한 문서를 발견했습니다!
description.polish: Znalazłeś akta wszystkich gatunków z ARK!
description.brazilian: Você encontrou os Dossiês de cada um dos espécimes iniciais do ARK!

description.english: You defeated ARK's first Guardian!
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il primo guardiano di ARK!
description.spanish: ¡Has derrotado al primer Guardian del Ark!
description.german: Du hast ARKs ersten Wächter besiegt!
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le premier gardien !
description.czech: Porazil jsi prvního Strážce ARKu!
description.koreana: ARK의 첫 번째 수호자를 물리쳤습니다!
description.brazilian: Você derrotou o primeiro Guardião do ARK!

description.english: You personally retrieved all the Artifacts!
description.italian: Hai trovato tutti gli artefatti!
description.spanish: ¡Has conseguido personalmente todos los Artefactos!
description.german: Du hast persönlich alle Artefakte gesammelt!
description.french: Vous avez récupéré tous les artefacts !
description.czech: Osobně jsi získal všechny artefakty!
description.koreana: 당신은 모든 유물을 회수했습니다!
description.brazilian: Você recuperou pessoalmente todos os Artefatos!

description.english: You defeated ARK's second Guardian!
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il secondo guardiano di ARK!
description.spanish: ¡Has derrotado al segundo Guardian del Ark!
description.german: Du hast ARKs zweiten Wächter besiegt!
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le second gardien !
description.czech: Porazil jsi druhého Strážce ARKu!
description.koreana: ARK의 두 번째 수호자를 물리쳤습니다!
description.brazilian: Você derrotou o segundo Guardião do ARK!

description.english: You defeated ARK's third Guardian!
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il terzo guardiano di ARK!
description.spanish: ¡Has derrotado al tercer Guardian del Ark!
description.german: Du hast ARKs dritten Wächter besiegt!
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le troisième gardien !
description.czech: Porazil jsi třetího Strážce ARKu!
description.koreana: ARK의 세 번째 수호자를 물리쳤습니다!
description.brazilian: Você derrotou o terceiro Guardião do ARK!

description.english: You've defeated ARK's three Guardians! And yet...
description.italian: Hai sconfitto i tre guardiani di ARK! E...
description.spanish: ¡Has derrotado a los tres Guardianes del Ark! Aunque...
description.turkish: ARK'ın üç Muhafızını da yendin! Ve henüz...
description.german: Du hast die drei ARK-Wächter der besiegt! Aber...
description.french: Vous avez vaincu les trois gardiens ! Mais...
description.russian: Вы одолели трех стражей! Но все же...
description.ukrainian: Ви здолали трьох вартових! Але все ж...
description.czech: Porazil jsi tři Strážce ARKu! A přece...
description.finnish: Olet päihittänyt ARKin kolme Vartijaa! Ja vielä...
description.hungarian: Legyőzted az ARK három Örzőjét! És még...
description.koreana: ARK의 세 수호자를 모두 물리쳤습니다! 하지만 아직입니다...
description.brazilian: Você derrotou os três Guardiões do ARK! Mas...

description.english: You Survived a full day and night on the ARK!
description.italian: Sei sopravvissuto un intero giorno e un'intera notte in ARK!
description.spanish: ¡Has sobrevivido un día y noche entera en el ARK!
description.turkish: ARK'da bir gün ve gece hayatta kaldın!
description.german: Du hast 24 Stunden in ARK überlebt!
description.french: Vous avez survécu un jour et une nuit complète !
description.russian: Вы выжили в течение 24 игровых часов!
description.czech: Přežil jsi celý den i noc v ARKu!
description.finnish: Selvisit täyden päivän ja yön ARKissa!
description.hungarian: Túléltél egy teljes napot és éjszakát az ARK-on!
description.koreana: ARK에서 하루 밤 낮을 온전히 생존하셨습니다!
description.brazilian: Você Sobreviveu um dia e uma noite inteira no ARK!

description.english: You Tamed a Dinosaur!
description.italian: Hai domato un dinosauro!
description.spanish: ¡Has Domesticado a un Dinosaurio!
description.german: Du hast einen Dinosaurier gezähmt!
description.french: Vous avez apprivoisé un dinosaure !
description.czech: Ochočil jsi dinosaura!
description.koreana: 공룡을 길들였습니다!
description.brazilian: Você domesticou um dinossauro!

description.english: You Rode a Dinosaur!
description.italian: Hai cavalcato un dinosauro!
description.spanish: ¡Has Montado en un Dinosaurio!
description.german: Du bist auf einem Dinosaurier geritten!
description.french: Vous avez chevauché un dinosaure !
description.czech: Jezdil jsi na dinosaurovi!
description.koreana: 공룡에 탑승했습니다!
description.brazilian: Você montou em um dinossauro!

description.english: You reached the Maximum Survivor Level!
description.italian: Hai raggiunto il livello massimo!
description.spanish: ¡Has alcanzado el Nivel Máximo de Superviviente!
description.german: Du hast den höchsten Level erreicht!
description.french: Vous avez atteint le niveau maximum du survivant !
description.czech: Dosáhnul jsi Maximální Úrovně Přeživšího!
description.koreana: 최고의 생존가 레벨에 도달하였습니다!
description.polish: Twoja postać osiągnęła najwyższy poziom w grze!
description.brazilian: Você atingiu o Nível Máximo do Sobrevivente!

description.english: One of your Dinosaurs reached Maximum Level!
description.italian: Uno dei tuoi dinosauri ha raggiunto il livello massimo!
description.spanish: ¡Uno de tus Dinosaurios ha alcanzado el nivel máximo!
description.german: Einer deiner Dinosaurier hat den höchsten Level erreicht!
description.french: Un des vos dinosaures a atteint le niveau Maximum !
description.russian: Один из ваших дино достиг максимального уровня!
description.ukrainian: Один із ваших динозаврів досяг максимального рівня!
description.czech: Jeden z tvých dinosaurů dosáhl Maximální Úrovně!
description.hungarian: Az egyik Dínoszauruszod elérte a Maximum Szintet!
description.koreana: 당신의 공룡 중 하나가 최고의 레벨이 되었습니다!
description.polish: Jeden z twoich dinozaurów osiągnął maksymalny poziom!
description.brazilian: Um dos seus dinossauros atingiu o nível máximo!

description.english: You rode on the back of a T-Rex!
description.italian: Hai cavalcato un Tirannosauro!
description.spanish: ¡Has montado en la espalda de un T-Rex!
description.german: Du bist auf dem Rücken eines T-Rex geritten!
description.french: Vous êtes monté sur le dos d’un T-Rex !
description.czech: Jezdil jsi na zádech T-Rexe!
description.koreana: 티 렉스에 탑승하였습니다!
description.brazilian: Você montou nas costas de um T-Rex!

description.english: You rode on the back of a Giganotosaurus!
description.italian: Hai cavalcato un Giganotosauro!
description.spanish: ¡Has montado en la espalda de un Giganotosaurio!
description.german: Du bist auf dem Rücken eines Giganotosaurus geritten!
description.french: Vous êtes monté sur le dos d’un Giganotosaure !
description.czech: Jezdil jsi na zádech Giganotosaura!
description.koreana: 기가노토사우르스에 탑승하였습니다!
description.brazilian: Você montou nas costas de um Giganotossauro!

description.english: You uncovered more than 80% of the Mini-Map!
description.italian: Hai scoperto più dell'80% della minimappa!
description.spanish: ¡Has descubierto más del 80% del Mini-Mapa!
description.german: Du hast mehr als 80% der Karte aufgedeckt!
description.french: Vous avez découvert plus de 80 % de la mini-Map !
description.czech: Odkryl jsi více než 80% Minimapy!
description.hungarian: Felfedezted több mint a 80%-át a Térképnek!
description.koreana: 미니맵의 80% 이상을 탐험하였습니다!
description.brazilian: Você descobriu mais de 80% do Mini Mapa!

description.english: You've reached the highest mountain peak of the ARK!
description.italian: Hai raggiunto la vetta più alta di ARK!
description.spanish: ¡Haz alcanzado el pico de montaña más alta de ARK!
description.turkish: ARK'ın en yüksek dağ zirvesine ulaştın!
description.german: Du hast den höchsten Gipfel der ARK erklommen!
description.french: Vous avez atteint le plus haut sommet !
description.czech: Dostal jsi se na vrchol nejvyšší hory ARKu!
description.finnish: Olet saavuttanut ARKin korkeimman vuoren huipun!
description.koreana: ARK에서 가장 높은 산 꼭대기에 도달하였습니다!
description.polish: Dotarłeś do najwyższego szczytu w ARK!
description.brazilian: Você chegou ao topo da montanha mais alta do ARK!

description.english: You've reached the bottom of the ARK's oceans!
description.italian: Hai raggiunto il fondo degli oceani di ARK!
description.spanish: ¡Haz llegado al fondo de los océanos de ARK!
description.german: Du hast den Grund des ARK Ozeans erreicht!
description.french: Vous avez atteint le fond des océans !
description.russian: Вы посетили самую глубокую точку океана!
description.czech: Dostal jsi se na dno oceánu ARKu!
description.hungarian: Elérted az ARK óceánjának a fenekét!
description.koreana: ARK 바다의 밑바닥에 도달하였습니다!
description.polish: Dotarłeś do dna oceanów w ARK!
description.brazilian: Você alcançou o fundo dos oceanos do ARK!

description.english: You've cured yourself of Swamp Fever!
description.italian: Ti sei curato dalla febbre della palude!
description.spanish: ¡Te has curado de la Fiebre del Pantano!
description.german: Du hast dich selber vom Sumpffieber geheilt!
description.french: Vous avez guéri de la fièvre des marais !
description.czech: Vyléčil jsi se z Bažinové horečky!
description.koreana: 습지 열병을 자가 치료하였습니다!
description.brazilian: Você se curou da Febre do Pântano!

description.english: You Ascended off the ARK, at Gamma level!
description.italian: Sei asceso da ARK, al livello Gamma!
description.spanish: Has Ascendido del ARK, ¡a nivel Gamma!
description.german: Du bist vom ARK aufgestiegen, Gamma Level!
description.french: Vous êtes sorti de l'arche au niveau Gamma !
description.czech: Vystoupal jsi z ARKu, na Gamma úrovni!
description.koreana: 당신은 ARK 에서 감마 레벨로 승천했습니다!
description.polish: Zostałeś Wyniesiony w ARK, na poziom Gamma!
description.brazilian: Você ascendeu ao ARK no nível Gama!

description.english: You Ascended off the ARK, at Beta level!
description.italian: Sei asceso da ARK, al livello Beta!
description.spanish: Has Ascendido del ARK, ¡a nivel Beta!
description.german: Du bist vom ARK aufgestiegen, Beta Level!
description.french: Vous êtes sorti de l'arche au niveau Beta !
description.czech: Vystoupal jsi z ARKu, na Beta úrovni!
description.koreana: 당신은 ARK 에서 베타 레벨로 승천했습니다!
description.polish: Zostałeś Wyniesiony w ARK, na poziom Beta!
description.brazilian: Você ascendeu ao ARK no nível Beta!

description.english: You Ascended off the ARK, at Alpha level!
description.italian: Sei asceso da ARK, al livello Alfa!
description.spanish: Has Ascendido del ARK, ¡a nivel Alpha!
description.german: Du bist vom ARK aufgestiegen, Alpha Level!
description.french: Vous êtes sorti de l'arche au niveau Alpha !
description.czech: Vystoupal jsi z ARKu, na Alfa úrovni!
description.koreana: 당신은 ARK 에서 알파 레벨로 승천했습니다!
description.polish: Zostałeś Wyniesiony w ARK, na poziom Alpha!
description.brazilian: Você ascendeu ao ARK no nível Alfa!

description.english: You discovered 10% of the Explorer Notes on the ARK!
description.italian: Hai scoperto il 10% delle note dell'esploratore su ARK!
description.spanish: ¡Has descubierto el 10% de las notas del explorador en ARK!
description.german: Du hast 10% aller Entdeckernotizen auf dieser Insel gefunden!
description.french: Vous avez découvert 10 % des Notes des explorateurs !
description.czech: Objevil jsi 10% Poznámek Průzkumníka v ARKu!
description.koreana: ARK 에서 존재하는 탐험가 노트의 10% 를 발견했습니다!
description.brazilian: Você descobriu 10% das Notas de Explorador no ARK!

description.english: You've discovered 20% of the Explorer Notes on the ARK!
description.italian: Hai scoperto il 20% delle note dell'esploratore su ARK!
description.spanish: ¡Has descubierto el 20% de las notas del explorador en ARK!
description.german: Du hast 20% aller Entdeckernotizen auf dieser Insel gefunden!
description.french: Vous avez découvert 20 % des Notes des explorateurs !
description.czech: Objevil jsi 20% Poznámek Průzkumníka v ARKu!
description.koreana: ARK 에서 존재하는 탐험가 노트의 20% 를 발견했습니다!
description.brazilian: Você descobriu 20% das Notas de Explorador no ARK!

description.spanish: ¡Has descubierto el 80% de las notas del explorador en ARK!

description.spanish: ¡Has descubierto el 90% de las notas del explorador en ARK!
description.german: Du hast 90% aller Entdeckernotizen auf dieser Insel gefunden!

description.brazilian: Você descobriu 90% das Notas de Explorador no ARK!

description.english: You've discovered 100% of the Explorer Notes on the ARK!
description.italian: Hai scoperto il 100% delle note dell'esploratore su ARK!
description.spanish: ¡Has descubierto el 100% de las notas de explorador en ARK!
description.german: Du hast alle Entdeckernotizen auf dieser Insel gefunden!
description.french: Vous avez découvert 100 % des Notes des explorateurs !
description.czech: Objevil jsi 100% Poznámek Průzkumníka v ARKu!
description.koreana: ARK 에서 존재하는 탐험가 노트의 100% 를 발견했습니다!
description.polish: Odnalazłeś wszystkie Notatki Odkrywców w ARK!
description.brazilian: Você descobriu 100% das Notas de Explorador no ARK!

description.english: You tamed all of the domesticable creatures on the ARK!
description.german: Du hast alle zähmbaren Kreaturen des ARK´s gezähmt!
description.french: Vous avez apprivoisé toutes les créatures domesticables !
description.italian: Hai domato tutte le creature addomesticabili in ARK!
description.spanish: ¡Has domesticado a todas las criaturas domesticables del ARK!
description.czech: Ochočil jsi všechny domestikovatelné stvoření v ARKu!
description.hungarian: Megszelídítetted az összes szelídíthető lényét az ARK-nak!
description.koreana: 당신은 ARK 에서 존재하는 모든 생물을 길들였습니다!
description.polish: Udomowiłeś wszystkie oswajalne stworzenia w ARK!
description.brazilian: Você domesticou todas as criaturas domésticaveis no ARK!

description.english: You defeated the Guardians of The Center!
description.ukrainian: Ви здолали вартових мапи The Center!
description.german: Besiege die Wächter auf The Center!
description.italian: Hai sconfitto i Guardiani di The Center!
description.french: Vous avez vaincu les gardiens de The Center !
description.spanish: ¡Has derrotado a los guardianes de The Center!
description.russian: Вы одолели всех стражей на карте The Center!
description.czech: Pokořil jsi Strážce The Centeru!
description.koreana: 당신은 중앙의 수호자를 사살했습니다!
description.brazilian: Você derrotou os Guardiões do The Center!
